mapper.select: select arr_id, arr_money, arr_month, arr_other, arr_sfpay, o.om_id, o.tom_name, o.tom_card, o.tom_number, o.tom_check_intime, b.bid, b.bname, f.fname as fjh,f1.fname as cshu,f2.fname as ldh from arrears a inner join oldman o on a.om_id = o.om_id left join bed b on o.om_id = b.om_id left join floor f on b.fid = f.fid left join floor f1 on f1.fid = f.fdad left join floor f2 on f2.fid = f1.fdad order by arr_id desc
